useCase.name: Create Operation Request
useCase.description: Allows a Doctor to create an operation request.

preconditions.precondition: The Doctor is logged in and has necessary permissions.

successEndConditions.condition: The operation request is successfully created.

failureEndConditions.condition: An error occurs during the creation process.

useCase.trigger: Doctor navigates to Create Operation Request page.

mainSequence.step: Doctor navigates to Create Operation Request page.
Doctor fills in operation request information including Patient ID, Doctor ID, Operation Type ID, Deadline, and Priority.
UI sends operation data to Operation Request Service.
Operation Request Service obtains authentication token.
Operation Request Service checks Doctor's role using the token.
Operation Request Service sends a POST request to Backend API to create the operation request.
Operation Request Service returns success to UI.
UI sets success message and clears the form.
UI displays success message to Doctor.

asteps.step: An error occurs during the creation process.
Operation Request Service throws an error to UI.
UI displays error message to Doctor.
